Button Component ✨

Provides beautiful built-in button component

> ⚠ Works only with -d:enableUi flag ⚠

appRoutes "app":
  "/":
    component Button:
      "Click me!"
    tBr
    component Button(flat = true):
      "Click me!"

flatbool❌false
